channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: FireAid Releases Statement Disputing ‘Misinformation’ on Distribution of Funds Raised for L.A. Wildfire Relief
item.description: 🔥 FireAid sets the record straight on L.A. wildfire relief funds! Let's keep the good vibes going! 💪 #FireAidStatement 🌟

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter Reveals ‘Man’s Best Friend’ Tracklist Via Golden Retriever
item.description: 🎶🐾 Woof woof! @SabrinaAnnLynn gets paws-on with new tracklist reveal! 🐶🎶 #Man'sBestFriend #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Watch Hayley Williams, Waxahatchee, Jeff Tweedy and others join Bleachers at Newport Folk Festival
item.description: 🎶😍 Rock out with Hayley Williams, Waxahatchee, Jeff Tweedy and more at Newport Folk Festival! 🎤✨ #MusicFestMadness

item.title: Billy Joel Drops Massive 115-Song ‘And So It Goes’ Companion Playlist
item.description: 🎹 Dive into a musical goldmine! Billy Joel unveils a whopping 115-song 'And So It Goes' playlist 🎶✨ #BillyJoel #NewMusicAlert

item.title: King Gizzard & The Lizard Wizard Pull Catalog From Spotify
item.description: 🦎 King Gizzard & The Lizard Wizard making moves! Where will you be jamming to their tunes now? 🎶 #MusicNews #KingGizzard
